subject: Basketball
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The women’s basketball coach at the United States Coast Guard Academy who committed suicide earlier this month had been put on paid leave three days before his death amid an investigation by federal prosecutors, a university official has said.
snippet: The women’s basketball coach at the United States Coast Guard Academy who committed suicide earlier this month had been put on paid leave three days before his death amid an investigation by federal prosecutors, a university official has said.
